products.name: Kayapalat Essential Oil
products.description: Pure, therapeutic-grade essential oil for relaxation and balance.
products.longDescription:
Our Kayapalat Essential Oil is a carefully crafted blend of pure, therapeutic-grade essential oils designed to promote relaxation, balance, and overall well-being. This unique formulation combines the wisdom of ancient Ayurvedic practices with modern aromatherapy techniques to create a powerful tool for your daily wellness routine.

Each bottle contains a harmonious blend of lavender, frankincense, sandalwood, and ylang-ylang oils, known for their calming and grounding properties. The oil can be used in a diffuser, added to bath water, or diluted with a carrier oil for a soothing massage.

products.name: Ayurvedic Wellness Tea
products.description: Organic herbal blend to support digestion and immunity.
products.longDescription:
Our Ayurvedic Wellness Tea is a delicious and nourishing blend of organic herbs carefully selected to support digestion and boost immunity. This unique formulation is based on traditional Ayurvedic principles and modern nutritional science to provide a holistic approach to your daily wellness routine.

Each cup of this aromatic tea contains a perfect balance of ginger, turmeric, licorice root, fennel seeds, and holy basil (Tulsi). These powerful herbs work synergistically to soothe the digestive system, reduce inflammation, and strengthen the body's natural defenses.
